uk.tlscott.AtmSim

Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.tlscott.AtmSim.Account

  • public class Account
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to model a bank account. All transactions with the account are stored in a list of Transactions.
    Money can be deposited or withdrawn from the account.
    Author:
    Thomas Scott

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Account(int startingBalance)
      Creates a new account with the balance passed.

      Withdraws amount from account, reduces account balance by amount.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Account

        public Account(int startingBalance)
        Creates a new account with the balance passed.
        The initial balance is added as the first Transaction of the account.
        Parameters:
        startingBalance - the initial balance of the account.

    • Method Detail

      • balance

        public int balance()
        Returns the current balance of the account.
        Returns:
        current account balance.

      • withdraw

        public void withdraw(int amount)
        Withdraws amount from account, reduces account balance by amount.

        If amount to withdraw will result in the balance being less than zero, thread will wait until the balance is large enough to make the withdrawal.

        The withdrawal is recorded by the account as a Transaction.

        Parameters:
        amount - to be withdrawn from account.

      • deposit

        public void deposit(int amount)
        Deposits amount into account, increases current account balance by amount.

        If the balance after deposit is greater than zero, will call notifyAll() to allow other threads to attempt to withdraw.

        The withdrawal is recorded by the account as a Transaction.

        Parameters:
        amount - to deposit into account.

      • getTransactions

        public java.util.ArrayList<Transaction> getTransactions()
        Returns an ArrayList of all Transactions the account has made.
        Returns:
        ArrayList<Transaction> containing all transactions on the account.
